name: @chainsafe/blst
description: Typescript wrapper for supranational/blst native bindings, a highly performant BLS12-381 signature library

scripts.bootstrap: yarn install --ignore-scripts && yarn build && yarn install
scripts.clean: rm -rf prebuild/*.node dist blst/libblst.a blst/bindings/libblst.a blst/bindings/node.js/blst.node blst/bindings/node.js/blst_wrap.cpp

author: ChainSafe Systems
